item.title: Alberta Trans Ban: The Good, The Bad, & The Ugly [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ February 08, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew unpack the recent announcement by Alberta Premier Danielle Smith on their proposal to "ban" medical intervention for minors.

[Segment 1] - Danielle Smith and the NEW Alberta Trans Policy:
Tweet from Danielle Smith: https://twitter.com/ABDanielleSmith/status/1752814944716734935;
"Alberta announces parental rights policy protecting kids from the worst of transgender ideology" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/alberta-announces-parental-rights-policy-protecting-kids-from-the-worst-of-transgender-ideology;

[Segment 2] - The Response from Progressive Legislators:
"Alberta's new gender policy 'dangerous'" | CBC News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/VjCxX8Z91Fs;
Mark Holland: "Deeply disturbed" by Alberta's new policy | CTV News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/cEEcR1DZq6Y;
Justice Minister Arif Virani: "Alberta's pronoun policy looks 'targeted'" | CTV News: https://www.youtube.com/embed/64nCCcQD3ks;
Justin Trudeau on Alberta's policy: https://www.youtube.com/embed/F-5ZVhiP3VY.

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 02/06/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ January 30, 2023
On this first episode of our new Liberty Dispatch NEW BRIEF, hosts Andrew DeBartolo updates Canadians on the news they need to know, both here, at home, and around the globe. 

[Segment 1] - Latest on Canadian Legislation:
Tweet from Canada's NFA: https://twitter.com/CanadasNFA/status/1754250194794021029;
"MAID expansion delayed until 2027" | Global News: https://globalnews.ca/news/10265616/maid-expansion-delayed-2027;
"Euthanasia advocates in Canada justify MAID on financial grounds" | Cap For Canada: https://capforcanada.com/euthanasia-advocates-in-canada-justify-maid-on-financial-grounds;
"Federal, provincial governments rack up debts" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/30/federal-provincial-gov-rack-up-debts;
"Immigration minister: $364 million for refugee housing" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/immigration-minister-364-million-for-refugee-housing;
"Payouts coming for hundreds of Alberta health workers impacted by COVID-19 vaccine rules" | CTV News Calgary: https://calgary.ctvnews.ca/payouts-coming-for-hundreds-of-alberta-health-workers-impacted-by-covid-19-vaccine-rules-1.6744278;
"RCMP to fund sex changes for officers, up to $75K: report" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/rcmp-to-fund-sex-changes-for-officers-up-to-75k-report;

[Segment 2] - On-going Government Corruption in Canada:
"Trudeau and Singh's teams quietly planning electoral reform legislation" | CTV News: https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/trudeau-and-singh-s-teams-quietly-planning-electoral-reform-legislation-1.6744379;
"Lavalin storage a federal secret" | Blacklocks: https://www.blacklocks.ca/lavalin-storage-a-fed-secret;
"Trudeau appoints senator who donated $76K" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/30/trudeau-appoints-senator-who-donated-76k;
"Trudeau adviser defends use of crude language in online exchange with right-wing group" | The Star: https://www.thestar.com/politics/federal/justin-trudeau-adviser-defends-use-of-crude-language-in-online-exchange-with-right-wing-group/article_ae84cc8a-bedf-11ee-ab27-df4b248eb880.html;

[Segment 3] - LGBTQIA+ Colonization of Canada Continues:
"Violent trans-pedo sex criminal released from Canadian jail, Edmonton police issue safety warning" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/violent-trans-pedo-sex-criminal-released-from-canadian-jail-edmonton-police-issue-safety-warning;
"Black-only race segregation on Canadian universities" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/opinion/black-only-race-segregation-on-canadian-universities;
"We went to a college female varsity volleyball game and a sausage fest broke out: five men pretending to be women were on the court, why?" | Rebel News: [https://www.rebelnews.com/we_went_to_a_college_female.

item.title: DAVOS' DEADLY IDEAS: Fascism > Free-Markets, No More Free Speech, Tyranny for Your Safety [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ January 31, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew finally get to the events of the World Economic Forum Davos 2024 meeting and the deadly ideas shared therein. Welcome to 2024, where fascism is en vogue and promoted and celebrated by Canada's highest political officials.

[Segment 1] - EMERGENCIES ACT DECLARED UNCONSTITUTIONAL:
"ALSHOW - Davos Day 1: WEF" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/15/alshow-davos-day-1-wef;
"ALSHOW - WEF Day 2: Elites Hiding" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/16/alshow-wef-day-2-elites-hiding;
"ALSHOW - Javier Milei: WEF Socialism" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/17/alshow-javier-milei-wef-socialism;
Chrystia Freeland Speaks @ Davos 2024: https://www.youtube.com/embed/dwlGOXLBGFA;

[Segment 2] - THE REGIME & STATE-FUNDED MEDIA RESPOND:
"ALSHOW - WEF Online Censorship" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/18/alshow-wef-online-censorship;
"Lawton - WEF: Free Speech" | TNC News: https://tnc.news/2024/01/18/lawton-wef-free-speech;

[Segment 3] - Interviews ft. Dr. Aaron Rock & James S.M. Kitchens:
Tweet from Simon Ateba: https://twitter.com/simonateba/status/1750991985819762840;
"What are Canadians willing to sacrifice in the fight against climate change?" | The Star: https://www.thestar.com/politics/political-opinion/what-are-canadians-willing-to-sacrifice-in-the-fight-against-climate-change/article_56053220-aa71-11ee-b8d2-bba62f81b6cd.html;
"Carbon footprint of homegrown food at allotment increase" | The Telegraph: https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2024/01/22/carbon-footprint-homegrown-food-allotment-increase;
"To avoid the worst of climate change, we have to change how we travel" | Cosmos Magazine: https://cosmosmagazine.com/synergy/to-avoid-the-worst-of-climate-change-we-have-to-change-how-we-travel;
Tweet from wideawake_media: https://twitter.com/wideawake_media/status/1751575838951096604;
